about.title: About
about.birth: I was born in İstanbul in 1988 and completed my education here.
about.scholarship: I focused on foreign languages in high school and earned a scholarship in college for a student camp in the United Kingdom.
about.graduation: I graduated from university with degrees in both officer training and engineering.
about.work_experience: I have worked as an officer in İzmir, Eskişehir, and Malatya. I later returned to İzmir as an instructor and received another scholarship for a safety course in the United States.
about.current_position: Now I am back in İstanbul, working as a Frontend Engineer.
about.family: I am married and have two children.
about.portfolio: This is my personal portfolio site which I developed using Next.js and TailwindCSS.

career.title: Career
career.english: American Lang. and Lit. Foreign Lang. Schools
career.zebra_desc: Worked on two web apps using Angular and TypeScript. Developed an admin panel with React and Material UI.
career.freelance_desc: Developed various web sites including organic farm, construction and sports wear sites with different technologies.
career.english_desc: Started as an instructor and was offered coordinator position after 5 months.
career.nat_def_unv_desc: Started my career as a hard-working trainee and graduated first. Worked under stressful and difficult conditions and later appointed as a teacher. Taught avionics to hundreds of trainees every term. Later instructed seniors and multinationals. Finally was the youngest to attend to new aircraft project for testing UI/UX designs and avionics.

education.title: Education
education.self_desc_1: Responsive Web Sites with HTML & CSS
